episodes.title: Actress Jessica Joan on Leaving the NXIVM Cult
episodes.description:
Actress Jessica Joan details her experience with the NXIVM Cult and talks about her new Freeform docuseries, "How I Escaped a Cult."

episodes.title: Catherine Oxenberg Wouldn’t Give Up Until She Rescued Daughter from NXIVM Cult
episodes.description:
Actress Catherine Oxenberg details the measures she took to rescue her daughter, India, from the NXIVM sex cult and reacts to the sentencing of cult leader Keith Raniere.

episodes.title: India Oxenberg On NXIVM Cult: 'It Was Inhumane'
episodes.description:
India Oxenberg, the daughter of "Dynasty" star Catherine Oxenberg who wrote the book Captive: A Mother's Crusade to Save Her Daughter, speaks about being a victim of the NXIVM sex cult and pyramid scheme headed by Keith Raniere.
